name: New Raft Survival Island Games
description:
Play the best raft survival game with new challenging missions in 2018. Experience the ocean adventure, with the objective to stay alive, gather resources and build a floating home worthy of survival. You are lost in storm and find yourself in the island; you have found a way to get back to your home. You see all kinds of debris passing by that made you realize that you are the only survivor of ship crash! Now you need to fight and struggle for your life if you want to survive! The angry and hungry shark is always near your raft, waiting for you to fall down so you should be careful! Gather resources from the water to craft equipment and instruments, find food and drinkable water to stay alive and expand your raft to create more comfortable place to live in! You have to collect items to live life in this unknown ocean.

Are you ready to explore the mystery island? And battle against all odds and dangers like a real survival hero of 2018. You are going to survive in this raft survival simulator by applying different survival techniques like swimming survival skills. Make the best sea adventure escape story on a dangerous lonely island where a big adventure is waiting for you. In this wilderness survival simulator 3D, you need to fight and struggle for your life expand your raft to create more comfortable place to live in and escape from this as soon as possible. Now you survived the ocean currents and got landed on an extreme lonely island where you are going to fight for your survival by crafting a raft.

Experience the best high quality graphics with challenging raft missions. Try to complete all missions and make your survival on the island and escape from sea successfully. Surviving here will be no simple task. Build a raft for the ultimate survival and mark the best raft sea escape story of 2k18.

Main Features:
- Experience high quality interface of raft on Island
- Realistic experience of survival on raft
- Complex and amazing challenges of survival missions
- Amazing 3D Jungle & Island Environment
- Beware from wild Sharks and other ocean wild animals
Download it now for free!
